channel.title: Weird problem
channel.description: I found a weird error in my serba. When I use an item on an npc I disconnect. I printed out my packets, and everytime I used an item on a npc, I got a different packet printed out, one time It even gave me the character input screen for friendremoving. I'm totally confused since this is sending random packets. Does anyone have an idea what this is.

item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @pitchblac23 pitchblac23
item.description:
@pitchblac23 wrote:

i have no idea that is weird for sure lol sometimes i get suspicious activity like theres a loop hole for a dupe or bug

Read full topic

item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“pitchblac23, post:2, topic:447139”]im guessing it looks sorda like this

[client-1-Pitchblac23]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms]
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Pitchblac23.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 138
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:12038)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:15996)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
ClientHandler: Client Pitchblac23 disconnected (127.0.0.1)[/quote]

had the exception parseincoming packets a few times, but not all the time.
the error came from my itemOnItem packet those times, i have no clue while item on npc, would call itemonitem

any idea?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I found a weird error in my serba.
When I use an item on an npc I disconnect.
I printed out my packets, and everytime I used an item on a npc, I got a different packet printed out, one time It even gave me the character input screen for friendremoving.
I’m totally confused since this is sending random packets.
Does anyone have an idea what this is.
